description:
Strava makes fitness tracking social. We house your entire active journey in one spot – and you get to share it with friends. Here’s how:

• Record everything – runs, rides, hikes, yoga and over 30 other sport types. Think of Strava as the home of your movement.

• Discover anywhere – our Routes tool uses de-identified Strava data to intelligently recommend popular routes based on your preferences. You can also build your own.

• Build a support network – Strava’s about celebrating movement. Here you’ll find your community and cheer each other on.

• Train smarter – get data insights to understand your progress and see how you improve. Your Training Log is the record of all your workouts.

• Get more from your workout – Powered by AI, Athlete Intelligence turns workout data into into instant insights. Keeping you motivated and ready for the next workout – without the guesswork.

• Move safer – share your real-time location with loved ones while outdoors for an extra layer of safety.

• Sync your favourite apps and devices – Strava is compatible with thousands of them (Apple Watch, Fitbit, Garmin – you name it).

• Join and create challenges – join millions in monthly challenges to chase new goals, collect digital badges and stay accountable.

• Embrace the unfiltered – your feed on Strava is filled with real efforts from real people. That’s how we motivate each other.

• Whether you’re a world-class athlete or a total beginner, you belong here. Just record and go.

Strava includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.
Strava uses HealthKit to export your Strava activities into the Health app and to read heart rate and biometric data.

You can subscribe and pay on the App Store, using your Apple ID. Payment will be charged to your Apple ID at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renew may be turned off after purchase by going to the ‘Manage Subscription’ page in settings. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. The subscription will renew at the same cost.

Terms of Service: https://www.strava.com/legal/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.strava.com/legal/privacy

Whether you’re a beginner or a fitness freak, with NoiseFit you’ll stay motivated as you get daily progress reports and achievements.
Connect the app with the compatible Noise product and get the complete picture of your well-being.

Apple health : Never Lose your progress. Connect with Apple health & keep track of all your activities at a single place. Your Heart rate, Sports and Sleep data will be synced to Apple health.

Steps tracker: Get accurate updates on steps covered, distance covered and calories burned with the app. Simply pair your phone with the app and get regular updates.
Monitor heart rate: With NoiseFit, analyse heart rate graph. Manage your stress and see the results of your workouts and resting heart rates and see if there are any improvements.
Measure your sleep quality: Set your sleep goals and access your sleep quality by measuring the number of hours spent awake, in deep and light sleep.
Stay Motivated: Get celebratory notifications when you achieve your set goal.
With just a single tap, stay connected with the world. Get notified of calls and messages right on your fingertips.

Noise Premiere League (NPL) is a campaign where users can predict the winners of daily Indian T20 League matches and win exciting rewards. However, we want to clarify that this campaign is solely intended for entertainment purposes, and it does not promote or encourage any form of betting or gambling. The rewards offered in this campaign hold no real monetary value and are strictly non-transferable. Additionally, there is no need for any monetary transactions to participate in the 'Noise Premiere League' campaign. By participating in the campaign, you acknowledge and agree to these terms and conditions.

Disclaimer: This app is intended to support health management and provide general information. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified healthcare provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay seeking treatment because of something you have read in this app.

Terms of use & Privacy policy: https://www.gonoise.com/pages/app-privacy-policy

Welcome to cult.fit, your one stop fitness app for fun gym & workout sessions. Here fitness meets fun, and sports come to life. We offer an extensive range of gym workouts to suit all your fitness needs. From dance workouts & yoga sessions led by our expert trainers to exercise routines designed for home fitness our app ensures your health journey is effective and enjoyable. Dive into a variety of fitness and sports activities such as badminton, swimming, tennis, etc, curated just for you

Workout From the Gym or Exercise at Home - We've Got You Covered
Whether you prefer the convenience of home fitness or the dynamic environment of a fitness setup, cult.fit has you covered. Our app features training programs that cater to both home workout enthusiasts and those who thrive in a gym setting. With a workout app that brings fitness to your fingertips, you can achieve your goals with the guidance of top-notch gym trainers.

Types of Workouts : Curated Just For You

Boxing: Build strength and agility.
Yoga: Enhance flexibility and find balance with hatha yoga & evolve yoga
Dance Fitness Workout: Enjoy a fun dance fitness workout where you can burn calories to great music
Strength & Conditioning: Gain muscle and improve endurance with our strength training workout
Burn: A workout format that combines high-intensity lower-impact training with other key elements of fitness like strength & mobility
HRX: Helps in building core + full-body strength, muscle gaining, and mobility
Bootcamp & Transform: Targeted routines for weight loss.

cultpass ELITE and cultpass PRO

Discover the benefits of our premium memberships, cultpass ELITE and cultpass PRO. If you goal is to achieve a holistic full body workout, lose belly fat or do a cardio session, these memberships offer:
Access to exclusive group classes and fun group workout formats.
Comprehensive workout plans tailored to your needs.
Support from professional trainers to guide you every step of the way

Explore our state-of-the-art sports facilities in major cities including Bangalore, Delhi, Mumbai, and more. With cult PLAY, you can enjoy:
Swimming
Badminton
Tennis
Table Tennis

Benefit from expert coaching, guaranteed playing partners, and beginner-friendly environments.

Yoga Workout For Weight Loss, Flexibility, and Strength
Experience the transformative power of yoga. Our yoga workouts are designed to aid in weight loss, increase flexibility, and build strength. Join our yoga community and embark on a journey towards better health and mindfulness

Transform your home into a fitness haven with cultpass HOME. Our fitness app delivers a comprehensive home fitness experience, making it easier than ever to stay active and healthy. 

Whether it's a quick workout or a full routine, fitness online is just a tap away.

1200+ at-home workouts across formats including strength, dance & yoga.
30+ goal based fitness programs.
Meditation sessions, health podcasts and more.
Tailored Weight Loss Plan To Suit Your Needs: cult Bootcamp
Join our cult Bootcamp for a customized weight loss plan designed to suit your individual needs. Our program includes:
Expert weight loss coaches.
Personalized diet plans.
Effective workout plans to help you lose weight and build body strength.

Luxury Gyms
Get an elite fitness experience with state-of-the-art facilities, best-in-class trainers, and exclusive amenities, including cafes and loungers, ensuring maximum comfort and performance.

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Traya is India’s first company to provide a holistic approach for hair loss by targeting the root causes. Traya provides personalised plans that are prescribed by doctors with trusted ingredients. More than 10,00,000+ customers are on Traya’s regime and have seen the desired results.

Discover the ultimate sleep companion with SleepWell: Health Tracker! Our app provides a comprehensive suite of tools designed to help you achieve the perfect night's rest. From relaxing white noise and soothing music to guided breathing exercises and engaging sleep stories, SleepWell: Health Tracker has everything you need to unwind and sleep soundly.
﻿
Key Features:
﻿
1. Sleep Aid:
﻿
- White Noise: Choose from a variety of calming sounds like birdsong, fire, rainstorm, and rain.
- Music: Enjoy peaceful and quiet music tracks designed to enhance your sleep.
- Sleep Stories: Immerse yourself in soothing bedtime stories that will help you drift off to sleep.
- Daily Picks: Curated content to help you relax and fall asleep faster.
﻿
2. Sleep Tracking:
﻿
- Sleep Monitoring: Track your sleep duration and quality with detailed insights and analysis.
Prevent Shutdown: Receive reminders to keep your device charged and running all night.
﻿
3. Sleep Analysis:
﻿
- Sleep Quality Score: Get a comprehensive sleep score based on three nights of analysis.
- Sleep Sound Recording: Monitor and listen to sleep sounds such as snoring, coughing, and more to understand and improve your sleep environment.
﻿
Transform your sleep with SleepWell: Health Tracker and wake up feeling refreshed and rejuvenated every morning. Download now and start your journey to better sleep today!
﻿
Choose from the following subscription options for unlimited access to all sleep well features:
﻿
• Weekly Subscription
• Yearly Subscription
• Lifetime Subscription
﻿
You may cancel your subscription at any time.
﻿
Free trial allows you unlimited access to all features for the duration of 3 days.   Your account will be automatically charged for renewal, based on the annual subscription plan, within 24 hours before the end of the 3 days free trial period.
﻿
You can cancel auto-renewal at any time, given that the cancellation is at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.   Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when making a purchase of an auto-renewing subscription.
﻿
Manage your subscription directly from your iPhone
﻿
Subscriptions can be managed by the user and auto-renewal can be turned off by going to the Account Settings:
- Open the Settings app.
- Tap your name.
- Tap Subscriptions.
- Tap the subscription that you want to manage.
﻿
﻿
For app support and more information, reach out to us at:
yiyi09281@outlook.com
﻿
Privacy Policy:
https://sites.google.com/view/privacy-policysleep
﻿
Terms of Use:
https://sites.google.com/view/sleeptermsofuse

Healthify is trusted by over 40 million users globally to simplify their health journey. Whether your goal is weight loss, improved nutrition, or enhanced fitness, Healthify provides you with world class technology & services to support you make data driven decisions through every step of the way. With Healthify you can

- Track Calories with photo or voice
- Log Meals
- Get personalized AI Insights & actionables
- Track Water
- Track Sleep
- Track Weight
- Track Workouts & Activity

Healthify uses image based smart AI recognition technology to bring you the convenience of tracking calories and meals with just pictures. Healthify App is also empowered with an AI Nutrition Coach to take personalisation to a next level with insights and analysis.

KEY FEATURES

SNAP: HEALTHIFY’S IMAGE-BASED INSTANT CALORIE TRACKER
- Experience the world's most advanced image-based food recognition system. 
- Track your meals by simply taking a photo. Track not only calories, but also protein, fats, carbs, and even fiber. AI image based nutrition tracking is a lot more accurate than people think.
- Snap automatically analyzes your meal’s nutrition, tracks it for you and also gives you a health score.
- Healthify’s food database is not 1 Million or 10 Million, it's INFINITE. Track any food from any corner of the world.
- Powered by the world’s largest food database, which is continuously updated for accuracy.

AUTO SNAP: HEALTHIFY’S AUTO-DETECT IMAGE FOOD TECHNOLOGY
- Every time you take a picture of your food using your phone’s camera, Healthify logs your meal automatically.
- Healthify is the only app in the world that has this technology. You don’t want to miss it.
- It’s super fast. You don’t have to open the app before, after or while eating. Just connect it to your gallery. The next time you open the app, your meal is already tracked.
- Just click, forget, and Healthify does the work!

RIA: YOUR AI HEALTH COACH
- Ria is your AI Health Coach on the go. It keeps you motivated in your busy schedule, with insights that are tailored to your progress.
- Ria can create meal plans for you, give you recipes, create grocery lists and even suggest what to eat. Ria tells you what’s healthy and what's not. 
- It gives you insights on your logs and keeps you on top of your game. Ria can educate you, give you tips and converse with you like an actual human coach would
- From logging your meals to helping you manage your calorie intake, Ria is your 24/7 health companion..
- Chat with Ria, ask anything. Ria is designed to be highly personalized. Need no equipment work out plan? Or… a Yoga plan? Just ask.

HEALTHIFY’S ONE-ON-ONE COACHING PLANS
- Connect with professional instructors/ nutritionists/ dieticians to enjoy dedicated one-on-one coaching.
- Healthify’s expert coaches give you the most personalised experience for reaching your health goals.
- They are your accountability partners. This is a premium service that blends human empathy with AI-driven insights to deliver the customisation you need. 
- Healthify plans are designed to be sustainable, long lasting and tailored to your needs. Your health, your terms and we find you the way.
- Get support in actioning small, achievable wins to keep you inspired, from weight loss to better energy and sleep.
- Get Holistic Health Transformation- Beyond weight loss—achieve better energy, restful sleep, and a lifestyle that feels amazing.

TECH INTEGRATIONS
- Sync with Apple Health to seamlessly track your steps, workouts, sleep, and more in real-time. Your data remains private and is used only to deliver personalized insights, coaching, and progress tracking.
- Supports wearables and apps linked to Apple Health, such as Apple Watch, Fitbit, Garmin, Samsung, and more.

Feel energized. Eat better. Move more - Without forcing yourself.

Download Healthify today and take the next step toward your health goals.

Read our full Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy at https://www.healthifyme.com/terms-and-conditions/

Join the world’s largest walking community!
StepsApp turns your iPhone into a sleek, powerful step counter — no extra devices needed. 

Just slip your phone into your pocket and get moving.
Set goals. Count steps. Burn calories.

STEPSAPP INCLUDES

• Automatic step counting
• Stunning charts and animations
• NEW: Workouts with Map Tracking, Heart Rate Zones and Insights.
• Apple Health integration
• Apple Watch support
• Workouts with GPS tracking
• Active calories
• Insights
• Trends. Totals. Records.
• Powerful day, week, and month views
• Awards with 3D medals
• iOS 14 widgets for your home screen
• Dark and Light Mode
• Six beautiful colors – also change the app icon
• iMessage app
• Today widget
• More Daily goals & Notifications
• Social media sharing
• Wheelchair support
• Export data
• No extra hardware required

YOUR ACTIVITY AT A GLANCE

• Quick overview of your daily steps, distance, time, floors climbed, and active calories.
• Beautiful weekly, monthly, and yearly charts.
• See your progress directly in the today widget.
• Display your current step count or wheelchair pushes on the app icon.
• Notifications when you have reached your daily activity goal.
• Weekly Report
• Set and reach your goal… step by step.

APPLE WATCH & APPLE HEALTH

• Synchronize and import your activity data via Apple Health.
• Track your activity with your iPhone and your Apple Watch.
• StepsApp will merge your steps automatically.
• Now with Apple Watch workouts with GPS tracking.
• Securely store your actively burned calories in Apple Health.

STEPSAPP FOR EVERYONE

• Also enjoy StepsApp with VoiceOver.
• Instead of steps, track wheelchair pushes with your Apple Watch.
• StepsApp supports more than 20 languages.

CUSTOMIZE & SHARE

• Spice up your charts with six beautiful colors.
• Also change the App Icon
• Share your achievements on social media directly from  StepsApp...
• …or with our brand new iMessage app!

Your activity tracker to form a habit of walking, running, hiking 
and weight loss.

StepsApp Privacy Policy:
https://steps.app/privacy

* StepsApp requires iPhone 5s or newer

Live in sync with your cycle using Flo, the world’s most popular female health app. Get personalised insights and predictions on your body.

Whether you want to predict your period, get pregnant, track your pregnancy, or better understand your symptoms, Flo is your all-in-one female health partner. Join over 420 million members.

With Flo, you can:
- Keep your data safe: Flo is the first period and ovulation tracker to achieve dual ISO 27001 and ISO 27701 Certifications (aka gold standards in data protection).
- Feel more understood: Share your Flo insights via Flo for Partners to feel more connected, understood, and supported.
- Get an extra layer of protection: Anonymous Mode means no one, not even Flo, can identify you based on your health data.
- Join a supportive community: Secret Chats is where members can discuss topics and connect with others on the same journey.
- Access reliable health information: Flo collaborates with a globally recognised organisation dedicated to reproductive health and rights, ensuring trustworthy support for your health journey.

With Flo Premium, you can enjoy:
- Monthly cycle reports
- Symptom predictions and patterns
- Tailored prediction insights
- Detailed pregnancy tracking
- Full access to Flo for Partners
- A 24/7 virtual Health Assistant
- All articles, videos, and courses reviewed by 140+ health experts

New! Flo supports perimenopause:
- Know what might be perimenopause and how to tune in to your body’s changes.
- Get clarity on common perimenopause symptoms and what can help.
- Make more informed health decisions and identify what you need to feel your best.

Start tracking your cycle for free today.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
https://flo.health/privacy-policy  
https://flo.health/terms-of-use 

Connect with Flo:
Web: flo.health
TikTok: @flotracker
Instagram: @flotracker

Please note: Flo is not a diagnostic tool and should not be used as a method of contraception or to facilitate conception. Predictions and insights provided by the app are intended for informational purposes only and are not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider for any health concerns or decisions.

Flo uses HealthKit to read menstrual cycle data and export your Flo activities to the Health app.

If you have any difficulties using the app, contact Flo via support@flo.health.

Notice of Access Permission:
Flo may request permission for:
- In-app notifications or reminders.
- Uploading photos to specific forum discussions.
- Uploading audio recordings to closed group chats.
Content sharing is entirely optional. Flo does not automatically access your content. You can select what you want to share.

The Fastrack Reflex World application is the ideal companion App for your Fastrack Reflex Smart wearable devices. To utilise all of the Fastrack Reflex World app's features, download it to your smartphone, then pair it with any Bluetooth-enabled smart wearables.

Use the Fastrack Reflex World application to set up and manage the following features:

- connect/disconnect with Fastrack Smartwatch

- Software /Firmware updates

- Personalise your settings

- Data such as steps, sleep, heart rate and skin temperature can be synced and accessed. Just so you know, these recordings are only meant for reference and not for therapeutic reasons. Before making a decision, please speak with a medical professional.

- Find my Watch

- Sync your smartwatch data (Steps, Sleep, Heart Rate etc) with Apple Health

- The Fastrack Reflex World application's settings and functionalities are only accessible when your wearable device is connected to your mobile device. Without a strong connection between your wearable gadget and your mobile device, features won't operate as intended.

- HEALTH APP INTEGRATION: This app integrates with the Health app.

*Some features are device-specific and will be supported only with specific devices.

The boAt Crest app allows you to link your smart watch with your iPhone.

Sleep Tracking
---------------
Auto track your Sleep duration and quality.

Fitness and Activity Tracking
----------------------------
Track your Steps, Distance and Calories burnt along with support for multiple activities like Running, Cycling, Walking, Yoga, and many more.

Watchfaces
-----------
A variety of watchfaces to suit your style. Select and push desired watchfaces from the app.

Phone Finder
-------------
Find your phone from the watch using the Phone Finder feature.

Alerts
------
Receive Sedentary reminders and alerts on watch for Calls, SMS and Social messages.

Fitness Rank & Badges
-----------------------
Earn badges as you keep fit and monitor how you stack up against others to get inspired and stay motivated. 

Fitness Buddies
----------------
Share your fitness progress with your friends & loved ones

Wellness Crew
--------------
Enable your collective wellbeing by sharing your vitals and other details with your family and friends.

Apple Health
------------
Apple Health is integrated with this app so that you can track your health with awesome features of the Apple Health Application. We push Steps data to Health App for better analysis of data for users.

description:
Enhancing skin & hair health every day
We understand the impact wrong products, mental health, nutrition, and environmental factors have on your skin and hair. This is why we developed Cureskin. 
Cureskin is a one stop solution for skin & hair, where you get skincare & haircare regimen given by dermatologists.  
We carefully scan through your pictures, ask the right questions, and consider all the above factors before putting together a kit designed to meet your skin and hair goals.

We simplify skin & hair care with 3 essential personalizations
- A personal dermatologist assigned to you

Track progress toward your nutrition, water, fitness, and weight loss goals with MyFitnessPal. This all-in-one food tracker and health app is like having a nutrition coach, meal planner, and food diary with you at all times.

MyFitnessPal isn’t another restrictive diet app. This is a health app to help you learn about your habits … see how you eat … make smarter food choices … find motivation & support ... and conquer your health goals.

Download and start your free 30-day Premium trial to access exclusive food tracking, fitness logging tools, and expert guidance. You’ll soon discover why MyFitnessPal is the #1 food and nutrition tracker in the U.S., a GQ 2020 Fitness Awards “Best Fitness App,” and has been featured in the New York Times, Wall Street Journal, the Today Show, and U.S. News & World Report.

SO MUCH MORE THAN A CALORIE TRACKER & FOOD JOURNAL

It’s like having a dietitian, personal trainer, and nutrition coach at your fingertips.

Log Food – Easy-to-use tools make food tracking quick and simple
Record Activity – Add workouts and steps with the fitness tracker
Customize Your Goals – Weight loss, weight gain, weight maintenance, nutrition & fitness
See Your Progress – Track at a glance, or analyze nutrition & calories in detail
Learn From a Registered Dietitian – Meal Plans customized for your target calories, whether you want to lose or gain weight—with access to our Meal Planner tool
Stay Inspired – 500+ healthy goal-focused recipes and 50 workouts keep routines fresh and fun
Connect With Community – Find friends and motivation in our active forums

A CLOSER LOOK AT FEATURES & BENEFITS

Gain Valuable Insights Through Food Logging

Discover which foods fuel you best. It’s not just a diet app, calorie counter to lose weight, or a faster way to fat loss—it’s about holding yourself accountable and understanding what you put in your body.

One of the Largest Food Databases – Track calories in over 14 million foods (including restaurant dishes)
Fast & Easy Food Tracker Tools – Type to search, add foods from your history, or quick-add calories
Bar Code & Meal Scan: Log store-bought foods and entire meals using your phone’s camera
Calorie Tracker – Automatically count calories and see your daily progress
Macro Tracker – See carbs, fat & protein breakdown by gram or percentage—no need for a separate carb tracker or keto diet app!
Nutrition Tracker and Insights – Analyze nutrition intake and set specific goals for macros, cholesterol, sodium, fiber & more
Water Logging – Easily keep track of your water intake. 

Customize Your App Experience

Choose settings that help you achieve your goals.

Custom Goals – Track calories by meal or day, set up macro goals & more
Personalized Dashboards – Pick stats you want to see at a glance
Net Carbs Mode/Carb Tracker – To simplify a low carb or keto diet, view net (not total) carbs
Protein Counter – Set your protein goals and track how much you eat during the day
Add Your Own Foods/Meal Tracker – Save recipes and meals for quick logging
Connect 50+ Apps & Devices – From fitness tracker and smartwatch apps, including the Health app
Track With Apple Watch – A calorie tracker, water tracker, and macro tracker on your watch face.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS

MyFitnessPal is free to download and use. If you upgrade to MyFitnessPal Premium, we offer monthly & annual auto-renewing subscriptions.

Payment is charged to your credit card through your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription renews automatically unless you turn off auto-renewal in iTunes Account Settings after purchase, or cancel your subscription at least 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period.

View our full terms & conditions and privacy policy: https://www.myfitnesspal.com/privacy-and-terms

Take control of your health – smarter, simpler, and more personal.

Vitaria helps you understand your body better with intelligent insights, AI Doctor Advice, and seamless HealthKit integration — all built with SwiftUI for a modern, smooth experience.

No more messy spreadsheets or disconnected trackers. Every health detail — from blood pressure to hydration — now lives in one secure, easy-to-use space designed with care.

What makes Vitaria different
- AI Doctor Advice – Receive personalized health insights powered by AI to better understand your daily trends and habits.
- HealthKit Integration – Sync your data automatically with Apple Health for a seamless experience across your devices.
- SwiftUI Experience – Enjoy a beautifully designed, fast, and accessible app built natively for iOS.
- Smart & Unified Tracking – Log blood pressure, blood sugar, heart rate, water intake, and medications — all in one app.
- Intelligent Insights – Visual trends, charts, and AI summaries help you see the bigger picture of your health journey.
- Reminders & Notes – Stay consistent with medication and hydration reminders, plus space for personal notes and observations.

Why users love Vitaria
- Simple, clean design that makes health tracking effortless.
- Secure storage — your health data always belongs to you.
- Developed independently, with no third-party templates or clones.
- Regular updates with new insights and features for your well-being.

Privacy & Responsibility

Vitaria is designed as a wellness companion, not a medical device.
It does not diagnose or treat medical conditions.
For any health concerns, always consult your healthcare professional.

Your data stays private — stored securely on your device and synced safely via HealthKit when enabled.
We never share personal information without your consent.

Terms of Use (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/vitaria-healthcare/privacy-policy

Build better habits with Vitaria – your health, your data, your insight.

Playo - Join the World's Largest Sports Community

Your Gateway to Active Living and Fitness.




Meet, Book, Play: Meet Sports Enthusiasts and Book Sports Venues Near You.

• Badminton Games: Can't find players or groups nearby?

• Football Games: Hate spending hours booking a turf?

Playo is the only app you'll ever need. Connect with playpals, book sports venues, find trainers, get expert advice, join activities nearby.




Sports and Activities Offered:

Badminton games, Football games, Cricket games, Table Tennis, Tennis, Hockey, Swimming, Volleyball, Basketball, Rugby, Kabaddi, Squash, Paddle Tennis, Yoga, Workouts, Running, Cycling, Trekking, Bowling, Kungfu, Boxing, Fencing, Archery, Bubble Football, Soapy Football, Surfing, Jet Ski, Hiking.

3. Explore Venues, Gear & Apparel

• Exclusive Benefits: Special offers at favorite clubs.

• Weekend Activities: Treks, marathons, and local events.




4. Your Profile

• Activity Tracking: Monitor your progress.

• Health Integration: Sync with HealthKit for real-time tracking.

• Karma Points: Earn rewards for app activities.

• Leaderboards: Compare your standings with playpals.

• Loyalty Points: Earn rewards at selected clubs.




Download Playo now and revolutionize your fitness routine with our cutting-edge app!

Eato® is a streamlined app for managing weight health through calorie tracking and meal planning, keeping you on the path to wellness.

Here, Eato® takes you on a new path of weight loss and improves your body health with scientific and effective methods.
 
FEATURES:
· Lose Weight Planner: Select your plan, set your goals, and track your progress. With the simple tap of a button, you can start or conclude your journey. Our clear, user-friendly interface ensures you can monitor and navigate your path with ease.
· Calorie Tracker: Get customized daily caloric intake recommendations based on your body's needs and your weight loss ambitions. Log food and meal calories through various methods, including search, barcode scanning, or AI image recognition, to stay on course with your dietary goals.
· Weight Tracker - keep an eye on your progress and let us supply you with the best plan tailored to you. Developing the habit of recording your weight is crucial for scientific weight loss and maintaining optimal health.
· Step Counter - Set your daily step goals, and we'll assist you in achieving and tracking them. Staying active has never been easier or more rewarding.
· Recipe Recommend - Enjoy three square meals a day, helping you maintain a normal diet during your eating window while maximizing nutrient intake. Based on your eating habits, we craft a personalized meal plan just for you.
 
Lose weight plans:
There are plans for beginners and experienced people. You can customize your plan. No matter your stage, a plan should always match your goal.
 
Lose weight recipes:
Knowing what to eat is the gateway to success. Eato® designs customized meal plans for you. We are not aiming to restrict your diet but to give you a nutritional supplement for your everyday meals. Three meals a day, guide you through hunger and satisfy your body at most in the eating window.
 
Why Eato®:
- The Most User-Friendly Calorie Tracker
- Personalize weight loss plan
- Helping you manage your eating window
- Telling you what exactly you should eat in each meal
- Wise weight loss method
- Friendly reminders keep you on track
- A step-by-step plan guides you to a good habit
- Guiding you to stay healthy and feel well

 
Apple Health: Apple Health integration to track steps for daily active goals.
 
Subscription Information: Eato® offers a 7-day trial subscription service for $79.99/year, granting unlimited access to VIP features during the subscription period. Your payment will be charged to your iTunes account upon confirmation of purchase after the 7-day trial. During the trial period, you can manage your subscription and cancel by going to your 'Account Settings'. After being charged, you may turn off auto-renewal by visiting the same section. Your subscription will automatically be renewed unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. The renewal cost will be charged to your account 24 hours before the end of the current period. When canceling a subscription, your subscription will stay active until the end of the period. Auto-renewal will be disabled, but they will not refund the current subscription. If offered, any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when purchasing a subscription.
 
Note: This app is developed for informational purposes only. You must always consult your physician or doctor before starting any fitness program. Results can vary.
 
Terms of Use: https://enerjoy.life/terms-of-use
Privacy policy: https://enerjoy.life/privacy-policy
 
If you have any questions or suggestions, email us at: service_ios@support.eato.health

developer: Star Health And Allied Insurance Company Limited
description:
Star Health and Allied Insurance Co. Ltd is a publicly listed health insurance company based in India. The “Star Health” mobile app offers customers instant access to their policy details and related information, along with Health & Wellness features from anywhere, at any time. The app also provides extensive information on a wide range of health, travel and accident insurance products tailored to suit its customers’ needs, with the added convenience of online purchase and renewal.
 
How do we cater to the needs of our customers?
The Star Health App offers effortless policy management and various health & wellness features such as Face Scan, Telemedicine, Health Risk Assessment (HRA), Step & Water tracker and more. Explore these features to enjoy seamless services and benefits.
 
Features & Benefits
Policy details and documents
Access policy details and documents like policy copy, Health ID Card, 80D certificate and more with a single tap. The app also facilitates easy claims intimation and status tracking.
 
Face Scan
Conduct a prompt health assessment easily using your smartphone. The face scan functionality lets you assess your stress levels, blood pressure, and respiration rate in minutes.

Telemedicine
This feature enables you to seamlessly connect with a wide range of expert doctors via video call or chat. It also allows you to schedule appointments at your convenience.
 
Steps & Water trackers
The step tracker monitors your daily step count to help you meet your fitness goals, while the water tracker enables you to track your daily water consumption and set hydration goals.
 
Health Risk Assessment (HRA)
Evaluate your health risks and receive personalised health insights on areas such as BMI, sleep patterns, and mental well-being. Just answer a few simple questions about your health and lifestyle to get a detailed assessment report.
 
Network Hospital Search
Locate your nearest network and non-network hospitals and labs through the app, ensuring quick and convenient access to the best available healthcare facilities.
 
Health Insurance Policy Buying
The app provides a seamless platform to explore a wide range of Star Health insurance plans, along with details of the required documents, empowering you to make well-informed decisions with ease to secure the health and well-being of you and your family.
 
Health Insurance Policy Renewal
Renew your policy effortlessly through the app’s seamless online renewal feature, designed to keep your coverage uninterrupted and hassle-free.

developer: ICICI Lombard General Insurance Company Limited
description:
The philosophy of “Nibhaye Vaade” is encapsulated in ICICI Lombard’s IL TakeCare app. All your needs can be met through a digitally personalized experience on the IL TakeCare general insurance app. You can buy health insurance, motor (bike & car insurance), travel insurance online & explore options for wellness too. With just a few taps you can get insurance, explore wellness solutions & health assistance features.

So, how does IL TakeCare make your life easier?
Motor Insurance
Our online motor insurance app offers users to buy two wheeler insurance and car insurance online, get motor insurance renewal & hassle free claims with our vast network of cashless garages.
Health Insurance
Buy health insurance online to access all health records like medical e-cards & policy related information & make instant claims too. Add your Mediclaim policy in the app to avail 24x7 tele-consultation at the comfort of your home.
Travel Insurance
Getting ready to travel to another country? Having a network of hospitals handy is great. Travel insurance provides the security of medical assistance, baggage loss assistance, and passport theft, amongst other things. Browse insurance offers to choose one that best suits your itinerary.

Features & Benefits: 
Quick & Easy Claims Process– Here is the best insurance app that allows you to register your health insurance policy claims, & motor claims easily.
Online policy renewal– Online bike insurance renewal is now easy with our quick & hassle-free policy renewal process. The app also offers quick & simple online health and car insurance renewals.
Health Assistance– Buy insurance and get answers to all your health & wellness related queries.
Wellness (Fitness Tracker)– Track your diet, exercise, sleep, and step count. Ensure your wellness metrics remain accessible to you.
Cashless Hospitals Network– Health policy holders can browse through a wide network of hospitals with options to search the nearest hospital-based on their current location, city, pin code and specialty-wise.
Get Well-thy– Hop onto holistic health & wellness with IL TakeCare. Learn from the experts about mindfulness, yoga, diet, nutrition and more. Calculate your overall wellness score based on physical, mental & social parameters.
Online Doctor’s Consultation– Use our wellness app for 24*7 doctor consultation over a call on any health-related queries anytime, anywhere along with an online prescription too.
Medical Emergency– Use the app to call an ambulance and find the nearest hospital from our wide network of hospitals.
Video Consultation – Audio/Video connect to 20 specialties and super specialties under IL Hello Doctor feature.
Step Up Challenge– A newly added gamification feature which allows you to challenge your family, friends/colleagues for step challenges using the insurance policies. The steps data will be tracked from Google fit.
Cashless Garage Network- Motor insurance (bike and car) policyholders can access a comprehensive list of cashless garages through the app.
InstaSpect– Use the mobile self-inspection feature to record a video of your vehicle, get claims faster & easier without the need of physical inspection. Make your bike policy and car policy work efficiently with the app.
Motor News & Views– Be the first to hear the latest information on vehicle news, launches, reviews, analysis & more through online car insurance app.

Customer Support: 
If you have any queries related to health, car & two-wheeler insurance, get in touch with our support team at:
Email ID: customersupport@icicilombard.com
Toll-Free No: 1800 2666
Also, visit our website: www.icicilombard.com

Discover the benefits:

- Unlock rewards: Use your sweatcoins to access incredible offers and discounts that you won’t find anywhere else. Your fitness journey has never been so rewarding!

- Get moving, get badges: Hit your daily step goals and collect unique badges for each milestone achieved.

Features

Device compatibility: Available on iOS devices. Apple Watch users can also enjoy Sweatcoin.

Get to a healthier and more active life with Google Fit!

It’s hard to know how much or what kind of activity you need to stay healthy. That’s why Google Fit collaborated with the World Health Organisation (WHO) and the American Heart Association (AHA) to bring you Heart Points, an activity goal that can help improve your health.

Activities that get your heart pumping harder have tremendous health benefits for your heart and mind. You’ll earn one Heart Point for each minute of moderate activity, such as picking up the pace when walking your dog, and double points for more intense activities like running. It takes just 30 minutes of brisk walking five days a week to reach the AHA and WHO’s recommended amount of physical activity shown to reduce the risk of heart disease, improve sleep and increase overall mental wellbeing.

Google Fit will also help you:

SEE YOUR WORKOUTS
Get insights and see stats such as heart rate, speed, pace, route and more for your runs, walks and bike rides.

MONITOR YOUR GOALS
See your daily progress on your Heart Points and steps. Meeting your goals all the time? Easily adjust your goals to keep challenging yourself to achieve a healthy heart and mind.

MAKE EVERY MOVE COUNT
All physical activity can help you lead a healthier life, and with Google Fit you can track it all in one place. Working with your favourite fitness apps and devices, Google Fit builds a journal of your activity. And to make sure Fit never misses a workout, you can manually add any activity that your other apps didn’t track – from aerobics to Zumba!

CONNECT WITH YOUR FAVOURITE APPS AND DEVICES
Google Fit can show you info from many of your favourite apps and devices that are compatible with Apple Health to give you a holistic view of your health, so you’ll never lose track of your progress. These include Lifesum, Runkeeper, Strava, MyFitnessPal, Headspace and more.

CHECK IN AT ANY TIME, FROM ANYWHERE
See a snapshot of your activity history across Google Fit and your integrated apps in your journal. Or, see the full picture in Browse, where you can find all of your health and wellness data.

Learn more about Google Fit and see a list of supported apps at: https://www.google.com/fit
